generator.group: Monash Institute of Cognitive and Clinical Neurosciences, Monash University

contact.group: Monash Institute of Cognitive and Clinical Neurosciences, Monash University

publications.title: Generation of four iPSC lines from peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCs) of an attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) individual and a healthy sibling in an Australia-Caucasian family

donor.disease_description: Diagnosed according to DSM-IV criteria; scored above 98th percentile on Impulsivity subscale and above 95th percentile on Hyperactivity, ADHD Index and DSM-IV Inattentive subscales of CPRS-R:L

differentiation_results.description: in vitro embryoid body formation and Scorecard
in vitro embryoid body formation and Scorecard
in vitro embryoid body formation and Scorecard

genomic_characterisation.summary: Karyotyping at passage 10 showed normal male karyotype 46,XY at a resolution of 300–400.

ethics.institutional_HREC: Monash University Human Research Ethics Committee (MUHREC)
